title: League of Chess skin line: Featuring..

embed.description: Having this sit on my HDD does me no good. L-R Malphite / Irelia pls nerf / Swain / Vayne / Mordekaiser / Cassiopeia / Shyvana / Singed League Chess Gothic

body:
L-R
Malphite / Irelia pls nerf / Swain / Vayne / Mordekaiser / Cassiopeia / Shyvana / Singed

Art and concept by [Tabnir](http://zamroyz.deviantart.com/art/League-Chess-Gothic-358407943) on DA

I think this is the same dude who announced the Runaway Bride Mundo concept.
http://zamroyz.deviantart.com/art/Runaway-Bride-Mando-358292066
Needs to happen.

replies.body: I would really like a king {{champion:268}}  skin. where his soldiers are (pawns/knights) and his ult will be knights toghether holding shields.
Pawn {{champion:45}}
Ok have Ahri trade places with Karma

*pictures naughty bishop skin for {{champion:103}} *
O_o oh my...
Spoder Kween {{champion:60}}
The champion and his knights
I would switch out Shaco with Vi.
Changed
Would purchase rook Malphite, kinda reminds me of Rook from Demigod..pretty sweet.

I could see Syndra being the Queen piece
*Imagines Syndra hitting people with Chess pieces*
YES
Somebody else knows that Shyvana exists and hasn't gotten a skin that wasn't Championship for a few years? Is that possible?

Shyvanna is too hard to make skins for. Her dragon form has always been a "Problem" riot said.
no wonder the dragon dude who was suppose to come out years ago was redesigned so many times.
There have been numerous fan concepts... I understand why the dragon may be an issue, but it shouldn't be a excuse to not make any skins.
Honestly, I don't know how we've gone 6 seasons without a line of chess themed skins. I just hope riot realizes this atrocity and corrects it asap .__.

I made a post a while back about have chess piece skins

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/xkNGEli5-we-have-card-skin-why-not-chess

> The pieces would be based on roles 
> 
> King = Mage
> Queen = ADC/Marksmen
> Bishop = Support
> Rook = Tank
> Knight = Fighter
> 
> First Pieces
> King-Azir: soldier are pawns
> Queen-Sivir
> Bishop-Janna
> Rook-Malphite
> Knight-Aatrox
> 
> Second Pieces
> King-Zyra: plant are pawn
> Queen-Draven
> Bishop-Bard
> Rook-Maokai
> Knight- Fiora

So I really would love for the chess idea to be made.
